resources.string: You are not allowed to double!
You are not allowed to split!
Your choice is not optimal. Better: %s
Should the dealer hit soft 17 rather than standing?
Systematically train the full strategy instead of random cards?

The screen displays your cards (at the bottom) and the dealer\'s visible card (on top). Play simply by choosing your turn with the buttons below. When the game is finished, touch anywhere to start a new one.
In systematic training mode, all possible initial situations are presented and repeated until your decision was correct at the first attempt.

Since the focus is on training BlackJack, also invalid choices (double / split in some situations) are presented, and you are only afterwards notified if something is not allowed. In addition, you are notified about the optimal choice in the current situation if you try to do something else.
See also the webpage for more details.
